content: this basic little garment is sure to add versatility to your warm weather wardrobe create your cropped crochet bralette in any lively shade of red heart it s a wrap sprinkles or enjoy the version shown this v-shape directional crochet v-neck top features crochet plus increases and decreases techniques top it with a crochet cardigan or other loose-fitting covergan and flaunt your hottest summertime look this bralette pattern coordinates with the eyelet stitch cardigan 1 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eyelet-stitch-cardigan
